name: Space Blaster (kukkieman)
description:
A simple 2D shooter.

Modifications:

  • Design: Created 2 new levels, the levels get more challenging in progression, menu font is changed to match background aesthetics
  • Aesthetics: All music was changed, colour scheme now includes a mix of purple and blue
  • Gameplay: An Objective Text to display tasks was added, Lives Counter is also displayed, a Spawner obstacle was implemented in Level 3
